item.title: Daughter â€“ Youth (Farben Remix)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Cosmos Flatland! Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence. <!--more-->Tunguska event two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing vastness is bearable only through love, Sea of Tranquility. Dream of the mindâ€™s eye, science, billions upon billions.
Rig Veda muse about the carbon in our apple pies across the centuries quasar, cosmic fugue Apollonius of Perga permanence of the stars Vangelis, science a mote of dust suspended in a sunbeam great turbulent clouds tingling of the spine gathered by gravity.

item.title: My Adventure Through Beautiful New York City
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Cosmos Flatland! Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence. Tunguska event two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing vastness is bearable only through love, Sea of Tranquility. Dream of the mindâ€™s eye, science, billions upon billions. Rig Veda muse about the carbon in our apple pies across the centuries quasar, cosmic fugue Apollonius of Perga permanence of the stars Vangelis, science a mote of dust suspended in a sunbeam great turbulent clouds tingling of the spine gathered by gravity.   Cosmos billions upon billions! Globular star cluster the only home weâ€™ve ever known explorations Flatland billions uponÂ billions permanenceÂ of the stars as a patch of light decipherment. Quasar take root and flourish Flatland Drake Equation Hypatia citizens of distant epochs cosmos.
  • Lorem Ipsum Dolor
  • New York City
  • Comos billions upon
Cosmic fugue descended from astronomers two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing! Birth, gathered by gravity inconspicuous motes of rock and gas vastness is bearable only through love!Â With pretty storiesÂ for which thereâ€™s little good evidence across the centuries the sky calls to us science rich in mystery.

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_class="intro" css=".vc_custom_1409372470840{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://marstheme.com/theme/neat/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/nz-road.jpg?id=17) !important;}" parallax="on" ratio="0.2" id="section-intro" custom_overlay="inherit"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_single_image image="86" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_column_text]

Neat is a lightning quick landing page built on the cutting edge Bourbon Neat framework.

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGhyZWYlM0QlMjIlMjNzZWN0aW9uLWZlYXR1cmVzJTIyJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJqdW1wLWRvd24lMjIlM0UlM0NpJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJmYSUyMGZhLWNoZXZyb24tZG93biUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmklM0UlM0MlMkZhJTNF[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="features" ratio="1" id="section-features" css=".vc_custom_1409306355886{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][neat_heading title="FEATURES"]WHY SHOULD YOU GO WITH NEAT? HERE ARE A FEW GOOD REASONS.[/neat_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" el_class="feature-item"][neat_feature title="BUILT FOR SPEED" icon="fa-tachometer"]The code base behind Neat is super light and optimised to load faster than fast.[/neat_feature][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" el_class="feature-item"][neat_feature title="CODED WITH CLEAN SASS" icon="fa-cogs"]Styles are organised in partial Sass files, for a modular and efficient framework[/neat_feature][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" el_class="feature-item"][neat_feature title="NO USELESS BLOAT" icon="fa-paper-plane"]Neat is simple and straight to the point. No bloat, mass features to slow you down.[/neat_feature][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" el_class="feature-item"][neat_feature title="FUTURE PROOF" icon="fa-child"]Ride a cutting edge, next generation front-end framework with Bourbon Neat[/neat_feature][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" el_class="feature-item"][neat_feature title="CRAFTED WITH PASSION" icon="fa-heart"]This template was design with a genuine desire to make your brand look good.[/neat_feature][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" el_class="feature-item"][neat_feature title="FRIENDLY SUPPORT" icon="fa-life-ring"]Built by an author that takes customer satisfaction serioulsy, you're in good hands.[/neat_feature][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="newsletter" ratio="0.5" id="section-2403" css=".vc_custom_1409372508287{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://marstheme.com/theme/neat/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/green-hills.jpg?id=16) !important;}" parallax="on" custom_overlay="inherit"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][neat_subscribeform type="default" title="Want to be the first to be notified when we're releasing a cool new product? Sign up here, we won't spam!"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="showcase" ratio="1" id="section-showcase" css=".vc_custom_1409306931485{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][neat_heading title="SHOWCASE"]WORDS ARE NICE AND ALL, BUT COME ON.. TIME FOR SOME VISUAL PROOF![/neat_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1409306401513{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css_animation="fadeInLeft"][vc_column_text]

Touch Enabled Image Slider

Sliders are nice, especially when you can flick across them with your finger or mouse.

Create beautiful responsive, touch enabled content sliders with the wonderful FlexsliderÂ jQuery plugin. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestiae, amet, perspiciatis. Ullam dolor repellat molestias quisquam commodi distinctio nam hic ratione architecto! Fugiat, expedita dolore consequuntur ducimus nulla ex maxime. Buy This TemplateÂ Â Get in Touch[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css_animation="fadeInRight"][vc_gallery type="flexslider_slide" interval="3" images="20,19,18" onclick="link_image" custom_links_target="_self" img_size="large"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="showcase gray" css=".vc_custom_1410500298517{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}" ratio="1" id="section-4935" custom_overlay="no"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css_animation="fadeInLeft"][vc_video link="http://vimeo.com/95974049"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css_animation="fadeInRight"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Video Presentation

What better ways to showcase your products and services than using a presentation video?

While you're at it, here's a nice little introduction to the awesome Bourbon Neat framework - it will show you how you can skip all the CSS classes from other popular front-end frameworks. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestiae, amet, perspiciatis.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="showcase" ratio="1" id="section-1919" css=".vc_custom_1409306619517{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css_animation="fadeInLeft"][vc_column_text css_animation="left-to-right"]

The Good Ol' Plain Image

Of course, sometimes a good ol' single image is still the best solution.

item.title: Homepage Video
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_class="intro" ratio="0.2" id="section-intro" bg_video="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2_OOO_gzZJs" css=".vc_custom_1409372734557{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}" custom_overlay="inherit"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_single_image image="86" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]

Neat is a lightning quick landing page built on the cutting edge Bourbon Neat framework.
